title: TILLING A GARDEN IN VIRGIN GROUND WITH A SUBCOMPACT TRACTOR

tasks.task: Operating a John Deere 1025R tractor with a 48-inch tiller.
subtasks: Safely operating the tiller to disrupt sod and grass.
Conducting multiple passes (down and back) to thoroughly till the ground.
Noting the removal of rocks and root debris.

tasks.task: Preparing a new garden or food plot.
subtasks: Recognizing the need for initial extensive tilling.
Assessing the effectiveness of multiple tiller passes.
Preparedness for lesser tilling needs in subsequent years.
Ensuring consistency in soil preparation for optimal growth.
